title: I do not want my border. Can i get it off?
body:
I don't want my silver border please 
You said that we could get off our border if we want. 
Need help please

replies.body: We should be able to help with this!  Reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can make some verification and confirmations, and we'll go form there!
